## Tender Description
Transport Canada is soliciting proposals for professional services related to project coordination and testing of zero-emission freight-hauling truck technology in real-world commercial operation within Canada. The agency has a requirement for up to two (2) contracts that must include testing of hydrogen powertrain technologies or involve projects located in jurisdictions other than Quebec.
